about_the_game:
Under the surface of the known lands lies a forgotten world, deep and silent, filled with mystery, magical wonders and dangers. There dwells the people of below, creatures of myths and legends, guarding the treasures of the underworld against those from above. The races from the surface have always coveted the rare ores and gems hidden in the ground, in dark caves under mighty mountains, and have more than once provoked the ire of the native inhabitants by their greed. Many wars have been fought for acquiring the wealth and hopes of the underworld. Many adventurers have died defiling the corridors of ancient dungeons.



Erdluitl is a real time strategy game, inspired by Dungeon Keeper and other old school RTS, combining RPG and Roguelike elements. Dig rooms and corridors, construct buildings and managing population. Keep your king alive and try to kill the enemy one. Employ various, brute force or more subtle approach, treason or espionage. Attract creatures into your dungeon, train a deadly host of warriors, forge weapons, research improvements and discover spells to throw in battle.

Features


  • Dig a dungeon, construct buildings
  • Mine, harvest and refine ores into useful resources
  • Produce food, manage population and attract new creatures
  • Craft weapons and equip your warriors
  • Train and feed your army for conquest
  • Build traps to bolster your defense
  • Manage diplomacy through alliances and treasons
  • Use spies to scout, assassinate and sabotage
  • Use special creatures skills to combine tactics
  • Send bombs to crush the enemy dungeon
  • Tale control of one of your creatures
  • Switch from RTS to Roguelike/RPG in game
  • Raise XP and level to unlock new skills and spells
  • Forge or find magic artifacts

name: Erdluitl - Legends of Below

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Win 7
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 11
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 660
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Erdluitl - Legends of Below is a 2D RTS inspired by Dungeon Keeper and old school titles from childhood. Dig and build dungeons, attract new creatures, manage population, train warriors and wizards, discover spells and assault your enemy !
